alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Mason; Peoria; Schuyler; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 10:55AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fulton, northwestern Tazewell, north central Cass, central Schuyler, western Mason and southern Peoria Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1055 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fairview to near Rushville. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Canton and Farmington around 1100 AM CDT. Beardstown and Trivoli around 1105 AM CDT. Astoria around 1110 AM CDT. Hanna City and Glasford around 1115 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Bellevue, Bartonville and Bath. This includes the following highways... Interstate 474 between mile markers 3 and 8. Interstate 74 between mile markers 92 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Fulton; Mason; Peoria; Schuyler; Tazewell
